Title: Pete's Dragon
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Writer: David Lowery (screenplay by), Toby Halbrooks (screenplay by), Malcolm Marmorstein (based on a screenplay by), Seton I. Miller (based on a story by), S.S. Field (based on a story by)
Actors: Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford, Oakes Fegley, Oona Laurence
Plot: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.
Production: Walt Disney Productions, Vineyard Productions, Whitaker Entertainment
